goal.ch: 本課程旨在引導管院大二的同學建構社會科學中科學性論述的基礎統計分析。面對資訊紛沓雜陳的時代，如何將手邊既有的資料轉化為可以利用的訊息，以輔助面對諸多不確定性下的各種決策與判斷，我們需要一套可以幫助我們洞察資訊內涵的工具與方法，統計分析恰如其份地扮演這樣角色。本學期的課程初期我們將介紹一些現實世界所接觸實際資料的型態與特性，如何以科學角度看待 與 觀察這些資料，並彙整出我們在決策時所需的資訊與 內涵 。課程接著鋪陳 機率 之 觀念 與 隨機變數 。討論 訊息集合與條件機率之關係、常見的分配型態、相關分析的範疇、統計檢定與推 論 等 基本統計概念。課程中藉由不同的個案與實例，結合理論說明各個統計觀念與模型 所蘊含的直觀意義與操作， 輔助 同學對於統計學的了解，以及進行統計分析。 經由資料整理、敘述統計與機率與統計分配 的統計基礎建構， 為下學期的統計學課程建立基礎，並 厚植日後學生在高年級 對其他進階專業課 程 與 未來在商業界求職或日後有志繼續深造時， 厚植 經濟 金融或行銷等商學 管理 領域所需的 分析 工具與方法。
goal.en: This course is devoted to introduce fundamental statistical concepts and methods to college level students in the Department of Economics, School of Management. Statistics are used in a variety of contexts ranging from scientific experiments to political advertisements and beyond. This statistics course introduces the basic concepts of statistical analysis, with a focus on both univariate (single-variable) and bivariate (two-variable) data. The course starts with an introductory examination and display of data. Analysis of univariate/bivariate data by way of measures of central tendency (such as the mean or average), dispersion (such as the variance), asymmetry, and associations for both qualitative and quantitative data is presented. We then move to the probability theory and statistics terms. The relationship of probability and statistics is also discussed, providing students with the tools they need to understand the role played by ”chance” in statistical analysis. Statistical distributions, with a focus on the normal distribution and its uses, are also considered next, followed by an introduction to various sampling theory and statistical testing. Some fundamental tests without parametric assumptions will be addressed. We then discuss the conditional models from linear regression model via OLS, and analysis of variance. The students are provided with enough theory and sufficient practice to conduct statistical analyses for their real life cases. This course is designed for anyone who desires to learn how statistics can produce better decisions and insights from the growing amount of data generated in modern business.
